workflow.name: Microsoft Teams | Send Card Message (two button) v2
workflow.title: Microsoft Teams | Send Card Message (two button) v2

properties.display_name: Microsoft Teams | Send Card Message (two button) v2

properties.script:
import requests,sys

body = sys.argv[1].encode(encoding = 'UTF-8', errors = 'strict')
webhook = sys.argv[2]
response = requests.post(url = webhook, data = body )
